did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Presbyterian Church of Clarkson records, 1816-1903.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Presbyterian Church of Clarkson (Clarkson, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of church meetings; minutes of committee meetings for business; minutes of session meetings (1869-1903); minutes of congregational Society; copy of incorporation paper of the religious society; various statements of articles of faith and covenant; financial and statistical reports; membership lists; lists of baptisms and lists of church officials. Revivals are notes in 1876 and 1902.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of church meetings (1816-1872); minutes of committee meetings for business (1855-1868); minutes of session meetings (1869-1903); minutes of congregational Society (1816-1897); copy of incorporation paper of the religious society (1816); various statements of articles of faith and covenant; financial and statistical reports (1816-1903); membership lists (1816-1918); lists of baptisms (1816-1900) and lists of church officials. Revivals are notes in 1876 and 1902.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Not to be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual mentioned in the records can be identified.
